scripts.gramine: docker build . --tag samchamani/gramine-coordinator:1.0.0 && docker push samchamani/gramine-coordinator:1.0.0 && docker run --rm -e sps=unset samchamani/gramine-coordinator:1.0.0
scripts.worker: iexec app run --tag tee,gramine --workerpool debug-v8-bellecour.main.pools.iexec.eth --watch --chain bellecour
